title: Border, 1800–25
description:
Wide upper band with stylized floral or foliate motif containing green motif with mauve beading under scrolling leaves. This alternates with smaller motif with floral element. Narrow scalloped band along lower edge. Printed in green, yellow, white and mauve on black ground.

H# 357B

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1800–25.
1800–25. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-10-a,b.
